summary: The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.
cast: Bud Abbott|Lou Costello|Lon Chaney Jr.|Bela Lugosi|Glenn Strange|Lenore Aubert|Jane Randolph|Frank Ferguson|Charles Bradstreet|Bobby Barber|George Barton|Harry Brown|Charles Irwin|Joe Kirk|Howard Negley|Vincent Price|Carl Sklover|Helen Spring|Paul Stader|Clarence Straight|Joe Walls
director: Directors: Charles Barton (as Charles T. Barton), Walter Lantz (uncredited)
title: Abbott y Costello contra los fantasmas
